sentences.english: In the background are the battleships of the U.S. fleet that made up the invasion task force. (AP Photo)
sentences.chinese: 圖片背景是執行入侵作戰任務的美艦隊的戰艦。

sentences.english: And Father was embarked in one of his own warships within twenty minutes.
sentences.chinese: 父親在二十分鐘之內便跳上了他的一艘戰艦。

sentences.english: The new battleship will be armed with 16-inch guns.
sentences.chinese: 那艘戰艦將裝備16英寸口徑的大炮。

sentences.english: Devastators should be used to decimate infantry and attack units at very long ranges.
sentences.chinese: 毀滅戰艦應該被用於遠距離大批屠殺步兵和攻擊單位。

sentences.english: A single, normal energy-projector shot could not by itself destroy a Covenant ship of war.
sentences.chinese: 單獨的一發標準能量發射炮彈不可能摧毀一艘戰艦。

sentences.english: We will try to be a new type of Galacticos who are more practical.
sentences.chinese: 我們會打造新型的銀河戰艦，會更實用一些。

sentences.english: In the late game obviously Devastator Warships are the way to go.
sentences.chinese: 在遊戲人物等級後期，顯然應該用毀滅戰艦。

sentences.english: After the Battlecruiser is upgraded, it can then use that particular special ability as long as it has enough energy to do so.
sentences.chinese: 只要有足夠的能量，大和戰艦可以充分使用升級技能。

sentences.english: Battleships would attack on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 戰艦也可以在海面上展開攻擊。

sentences.english: A large capital ship armed with broadside firing cannons. Capable of travelling across the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉克戰艦側舷密集排列舷炮，適合遠洋航行。

sentences.english: Until the time of shiny red glow of the sea, Look at our ships have to anchor.
sentences.chinese: 待到朝霞映紅了海面，看我們的戰艦又要起錨。

sentences.english: The new battleship shall be armed with 16-inch guns.
sentences.chinese: 新戰艦將以16英寸口徑的大炮武裝起來。

sentences.english: All fighters and warships of pictures area in mod.
sentences.chinese: 模組裏所有的戰機戰艦圖片資料區。

sentences.english: China's Type 055 destroyer as good as US Zumwalt-class destroyer?
sentences.chinese: 中國055型驅逐艦堪比美科幻戰艦？

sentences.english: A well-aimed cannon ball could hit below its iron covering and sink it.
sentences.chinese: 一枚炮彈準確地打在它的鐵皮下面，並使戰艦往下沉。

sentences.english: Fiftyfive flags freely flutter from the floating frigate.
sentences.chinese: 五十五面旗子在微微沉沒的戰艦上自在的飄蕩。

definition: aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale
Liaoning, the first aircraft carrier commissioned into the PLA Navy (commissioned in 2012)
